record.dc:title: 126BN25 Ledbetter, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 9BN79, indeterminate juvenile in good condition fully flexed with head to NE, deposited in semi-sitting up position. Child from Stratum I. Square 19L1. Direction SE.
record.wpa:narrative: This burial lay in Stratum II, intrusive from Stratum I. It was in a "sitting up position" with the skull about 1.0' above the pelvis.
